node.html: Implemented a Modified RSA algorithm described in IEEEXplore which uses a third prime number in order to make a modulus n which is not easily decomposible by intruders. Used Binary Exponentiation to increase the efficiency.

frontmatter.title: Image Classification on Fashion MNIST Dataset

node.html: Fashion MNIST dataset consists of a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples. A FeedForward Neural Network of 5 hidden layers has been used for the image classification. Achieved an accuracy of 90.35% on the test dataset.
Trained various machine learning models on datasets containg physiological, environmental and vehicular data collected at differenct instances to predict if a driver is alert or not while driving.
Scrapped through the books category of Amazon to retrieve 50 best selling books of every book category. The retrieved books are stored in seperate csv files for every category respectively.

Developed an application which automatically evaluates the user code for any given question. This outputs the line numbers in the code where the user has made a mistake to debug. It also can be used to check plagiarism in the code.
Trained a machine learning model to detect whether a message is spam or not. Used various model for training and Naive bayes seems to achieve a better accuracy in this particular scenario.
Implemented a method to randomly generate a tree given the number of vertices as input.
This project was developed as part of Google's #30DaysOfKotlin program
Contains the submitted patch files of the various tasks assigned by JPMorgan Chase & Co. Software Engineering Virtual Internship
A real time face recognition system developed in Python using Pillow, OpenCV and NumPy libraries
